data.name: BandedMatrices.jl
data.description: A Julia package for representing banded matrices

evidence: "A Julia package for representing banded matrices"
Badges and text indicate it is a Julia *package* (e.g., used via `BandedMatrix(...)` constructors and linear algebra operations), implying it is imported as a library dependency.

JuliaHub badges: "[![deps](https://juliahub.com/docs/General/BandedMatrices/stable/deps.svg)](https://juliahub.com/ui/Packages/General/BandedMatrices?t=2)" and "[![version](https://juliahub.com/docs/General/BandedMatrices/stable/version.svg)](https://juliahub.com/ui/Packages/General/BandedMatrices)", indicating distribution through the Julia General registry/JuliaHub.
